title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: Currently, when changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
EB: The preview should display the entire parameter name without any cutoff.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Navigate to the first page of the dialog.
3. Attempt to change a parameter name to a very long value.
4. Observe that the preview is cut off.
